title: Pokemon: Pikachu no Natsuyasumi
synopsis: Ash and his friends arrive at a Pokémon-only park. They set all their Pokémon loose and, after Ash tells Pikachu to watch over Togepi, they enter for a day of fun and relaxation. Unfortunately, it's not going to turn out the way they had hoped.
voices: ['Ootani, Ikue', 'Inuyama, Inuko', 'Koorogi, Satomi', 'Hayashibara, Megumi', 'Matsumoto, Rica', 'Ueda, Yuuji', 'Iizuka, Mayumi', 'Sato, Aiko']
staff: [['Asada, Yuuji', ['Episode Director']], ['Sonoda, Hideki', ['Script']], ['Tajiri, Satoshi', ['Original Creator']], ['Sugimori, Ken', ['Original Character Design']]]
